Decompile your APKs in one click

Just drag and drop your JAR. Now count till three. Your JAR is decompiled and is ready for download. Don’t worry, decompilation quality will be best in class.

Secure decompilation

We store your JAR file only for for a very short duration for decompilation and then delete the files. We do not store any of your APKs.

JAR decompilation which works on all platforms

Our web based JAR decompiler works on all platforms including mac, linux, ubuntu, windows 7, windows 8 and windows 10.

JAR Decompilation made simple

No learning curve as our decompiler is the simplest jar decompiler available on the web.

We support all versions of Java

We support all versions of Java so that you really don't have to worry about anything.

Quick decompilation on cloud

Our JAR decompilation use cloud technology for decompilation. You do not have to install anything on your machine for this decompilation to work.

How to decompile JAR online:

  • Appscms.com provides best in class jar decompilation, providing most accurately decompiled classes. Here is how to decompile JARs using Appscms.com

  • Upload your JAR for decompilation.

  • Wait for a moment as we decompile your JAR.

  • And your decompiled JAR is ready for download.
